A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow. Just wow. Some concepts were cool... story line was a mess. I never felt that one moment where the old characters were glorified. Instead Rey is like umm your best friend Han died. And Luke is like oh. And how about this. Leia your son killed your husband .ex and your brother. She is like it’s okay we still have hope. Give me some of that prosaic.
